sqlMap.sql:
where is_delete = 0
client_code LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%'
client_name LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%'
ceo LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%'
address LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%'
reg_date >= #startDate#
reg_date < TO_DATE(#endDate#) + 1
client_id desc
$sortOrder$
sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select rownum as rnum, client_list.* from ( select client_id as clientId, client_code as clientCode, client_name as clientName, second_name as secondName, address, phone, ceo, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'RRRR/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') regDate from client
) client_list where rownum <= #listEndNum# ) where rnum > #listStartNum#
select client_id as clientId, client_code as clientCode, client_name as clientName, second_name as secondName, address, phone, ceo from client where client_id = #clientId#
select client_code from client where client_code = #clientCode#
sqlMap.insert: insert into client( client_id, client_code, client_name, second_name, address, phone, ceo ) values( seq_client_id.nextval, #clientCode#, #clientName#, #secondName#, #address#, #phone#, #ceo# )
sqlMap.update: update client set client_name = #clientName#, ceo = #ceo#, second_name = #secondName#, address = #address#, phone = #phone# where client_id = #clientId#
